name: overgovern
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to control and direct the public business of a country, city, group of people, etc. more than is helpful or necessary: Poor farmers in the region have been over-governed for centuries. He has a tendency to micromanage and overgovern, creating an unhealthy work environment.
More examplesFewer examplesNow more than ever, the people of this country are overgoverned.Falling under the jurisdiction of two nations, it is in danger of becoming the most over-governed country in the world.They demand to be led decisively, but not overgoverned.
